description: A bronchial stent is a medical device used to support the walls of the bronchial tubes and keep them open. It is typically used to treat airway obstructions or strictures.

values.name: Present
values.description: The bronchial stent is present in the patient's airway.

values.name: Absent
values.description: There is no bronchial stent present in the patient's airway.

values.name: New placement
values.description: The bronchial stent has been newly placed.

values.name: Unchanged
values.description: The bronchial stent remains in the same position as before.

values.name: Complication
values.description: The bronchial stent is causing complications.

values.name: Removed
values.description: The bronchial stent has been removed from the patient's airway.

values.name: Right main bronchus
values.description: The bronchial stent is located in the right main bronchus.

values.name: Left main bronchus
values.description: The bronchial stent is located in the left main bronchus.

values.name: Lobar bronchus
values.description: The bronchial stent is located in a lobar bronchus (specific lobe to be specified separately).

values.name: Right
values.description: The bronchial stent is located on the right side of the airway.

values.name: Left
values.description: The bronchial stent is located on the left side of the airway.

values.name: NA
values.description: The side of the bronchial stent is not applicable or specified.

values.name: Fully covered
values.description: The bronchial stent is fully covered.

values.name: Partially covered
values.description: The bronchial stent is partially covered.

values.name: Uncovered
values.description: The bronchial stent is not covered.

attributes.name: Stent Length
attributes.description: The length of the bronchial stent.

attributes.name: Lumen Diameter
attributes.description: The diameter of the lumen of the bronchial stent.

values.name: None
values.description: There are no complications associated with the bronchial stent.

values.name: Mucosal erosion
values.description: The bronchial stent has caused erosion of the surrounding mucosal tissue.

values.name: Perforation
values.description: The bronchial stent has caused a perforation in the airway.

values.name: Migration
values.description: The bronchial stent has migrated from its original position.

values.name: Stenosis
values.description: The bronchial stent has caused narrowing or constriction of the airway.

values.name: Occlusion
values.description: The bronchial stent is causing a blockage in the airway.
